title: Drawings Box B (Blue Box)
medium: Ink, felt-tip pen, pencil, ballpoint pen, and colored pencil on fourteen pieces of paper in a paperboard box
dimensions:
Each (d-o): 9 3/4 x 7 3/4" (24.8 x 19.7 cm)
Case (a): 11 x 9 x 1 1/2" (27.9 x 22.9 x 3.8 cm)
Component (b): 4 x 5" (10.2 x 12.7 cm)
Component (c - sheet folded in four): 4 7/8 x 3 7/8" (12.4 x 9.8 cm)
credits: The Judith Rothschild Foundation Contemporary Drawings Collection Gift
